subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. has announced that the Rising Stars Challenge at All-Star weekend will have a new format, pitting first- and second-year players from the United States against first- and second-year players from around the world.
snippet: The N.B.A. has announced that the Rising Stars Challenge at All-Star weekend will have a new format, pitting first- and second-year players from the United States against first- and second-year players from around the world.
